name: Steamcraft 2
tagline: SC2 is a mod that adds Steampunk-themed power generation, blocks, items, and so much more. It is designed to work well with TE and BC
body:
Steamcraft 2 - MC v1.6.4 ======================== A mod that extends Minecraft by adding post-apocalyptic, retro-futuristic blocks/items.
You are welcome to contribute to this mod, however, you will need to discuss things with me beforehand. My Skype: johnny.eatmon
My Email:
Mod Post ========
Credits: - Proloe: for creating the first Steamcraft - Falkok15: for his amazing models - wierdude1999: for his amazing textures - decabeldecabel: for his programming and work with TileEntities - warlordjones: for his programming and allowing Steampunkery mod merge
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
